title: Poster, "The Invisible City,  Poster for the International Design Conference, Aspen", 1972
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
inscribed: Imprinted, lower right (vertically next to WAW label): Ivan Chermayeff; imprinted along bottom edge, lower right, Copyright c 1972 IDCA, International Design Conference in Aspen, The Invisible City.  Champion Paper Javelin Coated Offset/80 lb.
creditline: Gift of Chermayeff and Geismar Associates
description: Rows of airline luggage tags from airports around the world from ABJ (Abidjan, Ivory Coast), at upper left, to WAW (Warsaw), at lower right.  Text at bottom begins:  "Airports are a link to the peace and places of the world. . ." and is followed by a key to the airport codes on the tags above.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "The Invisible City,  Poster for the International Design Conference, Aspen", 1972.
1972. Offset lithograph on white wove paper. Gift of Chermayeff and Geismar Associates. 1981-29-59.
